com.Clerver.domain.mediator

Class DBManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Clerver.domain.mediator.DBManager

  • public class DBManager
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DBManager()
      Standard database manager constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String genitemName()
      Compiles the username from the other methods.
      java.lang.String getEnd()
      Returns the suffix of the name based on random number generation.
      java.lang.String getFront()
      Returns the preffix of the name based on random number generation.
      java.lang.String getMiddle()
      Returns the word stem of the name based on random number generation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBManager

        public DBManager()
        Standard database manager constructor. NOTE: it needs com.mysql.jdbc.Driver to work!! (it's included in the project). In chance of database name or location replace getConnection(-Location of the database-, -Username-, -password-);

    • Method Detail

      • genitemName

        public java.lang.String genitemName()
        Compiles the username from the other methods.

      • getFront

        public java.lang.String getFront()
        Returns the preffix of the name based on random number generation. It generates the number of the row and then using rs.next() it moves the cursor to the desired row. Returns the row's value into String.

      • getMiddle

        public java.lang.String getMiddle()
        Returns the word stem of the name based on random number generation. It generates the number of the row and then using rs.next() it moves the cursor to the desired row. Returns the row's value into String.

      • getEnd

        public java.lang.String getEnd()
        Returns the suffix of the name based on random number generation. It generates the number of the row and then using rs.next() it moves the cursor to the desired row. Returns the row's value into String.
